21 // Aligned Eigen containers
22 template <typename Type>
23 using AlignedVector = std::vector<Type, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Type>>;
24 template <typename Type>
25 using AlignedDeque = std::deque<Type, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Type>>;
26 template <typename Type>
27 using AlignedQueue = std::queue<Type, AlignedDeque<Type>>;
28 template <typename Type>
29 using AlignedStack = std::stack<Type, AlignedDeque<Type>>;
30 template <typename Type>
31 using AlignedList = std::list<Type, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Type>>;
32 
33 template <typename Type, typename... Arguments>
34 inline std::shared_ptr<Type> aligned_shared(Arguments&&... arguments) {
35  typedef typename std::remove_const<Type>::type TypeNonConst;
36  return std::allocate_shared<Type>(Eigen::aligned_allocator<TypeNonConst>(),
37  std::forward<Arguments>(arguments)...);
38 }

40 // Types.
41 typedef float FloatingPoint;
42 typedef int IndexElement;
43 typedef int64_t LongIndexElement;
44 
45 typedef Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 3, 1> Point;
46 typedef Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 3, 1> Ray;

49 typedef AnyIndex VoxelIndex;
50 typedef AnyIndex BlockIndex;
51 typedef AnyIndex SignedIndex;
52

54 typedef LongIndex GlobalIndex;
55 
56 typedef std::pair<BlockIndex, VoxelIndex> VoxelKey;

59 typedef IndexVector BlockIndexList;

61 typedef AlignedVector<LongIndex> LongIndexVector;
62 typedef LongIndexVector GlobalIndexVector;

97 struct Color {
98  Color() : r(0), g(0), b(0), a(0) {}
99  Color(uint8_t _r, uint8_t _g, uint8_t _b) : Color(_r, _g, _b, 255) {}
100  Color(uint8_t _r, uint8_t _g, uint8_t _b, uint8_t _a)
101  : r(_r), g(_g), b(_b), a(_a) {}
102 
103  uint8_t r;
104  uint8_t g;
105  uint8_t b;
106  uint8_t a;
107 
108  static Color blendTwoColors(const Color& first_color,
109  FloatingPoint first_weight,
110  const Color& second_color,
111  FloatingPoint second_weight) {
112  FloatingPoint total_weight = first_weight + second_weight;
113 
114  first_weight /= total_weight;
115  second_weight /= total_weight;
116 
117  Color new_color;
118  new_color.r = static_cast<uint8_t>(
119  round(first_color.r * first_weight + second_color.r * second_weight));
120  new_color.g = static_cast<uint8_t>(
121  round(first_color.g * first_weight + second_color.g * second_weight));
122  new_color.b = static_cast<uint8_t>(
123  round(first_color.b * first_weight + second_color.b * second_weight));
124  new_color.a = static_cast<uint8_t>(
125  round(first_color.a * first_weight + second_color.a * second_weight));
126 
127  return new_color;
128  }
129 
130  // Now a bunch of static colors to use! :)
131  static const Color White() { return Color(255, 255, 255); }
132  static const Color Black() { return Color(0, 0, 0); }
133  static const Color Gray() { return Color(127, 127, 127); }
134  static const Color Red() { return Color(255, 0, 0); }
135  static const Color Green() { return Color(0, 255, 0); }
136  static const Color Blue() { return Color(0, 0, 255); }
137  static const Color Yellow() { return Color(255, 255, 0); }
138  static const Color Orange() { return Color(255, 127, 0); }
139  static const Color Purple() { return Color(127, 0, 255); }
140  static const Color Teal() { return Color(0, 255, 255); }
141  static const Color Pink() { return Color(255, 0, 127); }
142 };

144 // Constants used across the library.
145 constexpr FloatingPoint kEpsilon = 1e-6;
146 constexpr float kFloatEpsilon = 1e-6;
148 // Grid <-> point conversion functions.
149 
156 template <typename IndexType>
157 inline IndexType getGridIndexFromPoint(const Point& point,
158  const FloatingPoint grid_size_inv) {
159  return IndexType(std::floor(point.x() * grid_size_inv + kEpsilon),
160  std::floor(point.y() * grid_size_inv + kEpsilon),
161  std::floor(point.z() * grid_size_inv + kEpsilon));
162 }
163 
169 template <typename IndexType>
170 inline IndexType getGridIndexFromPoint(const Point& scaled_point) {
171  return IndexType(std::floor(scaled_point.x() + kEpsilon),
172  std::floor(scaled_point.y() + kEpsilon),
173  std::floor(scaled_point.z() + kEpsilon));
174 }
175 
182 template <typename IndexType>
183 inline IndexType getGridIndexFromOriginPoint(
184  const Point& point, const FloatingPoint grid_size_inv) {
185  return IndexType(std::round(point.x() * grid_size_inv),
186  std::round(point.y() * grid_size_inv),
187  std::round(point.z() * grid_size_inv));
188 }
189 
190 template <typename IndexType>
191 inline Point getCenterPointFromGridIndex(const IndexType& idx,
192  FloatingPoint grid_size) {
193  return Point((static_cast<FloatingPoint>(idx.x()) + 0.5) * grid_size,
194  (static_cast<FloatingPoint>(idx.y()) + 0.5) * grid_size,
195  (static_cast<FloatingPoint>(idx.z()) + 0.5) * grid_size);
196 }
197 
198 template <typename IndexType>
199 inline Point getOriginPointFromGridIndex(const IndexType& idx,
200  FloatingPoint grid_size) {
201  return Point(static_cast<FloatingPoint>(idx.x()) * grid_size,
202  static_cast<FloatingPoint>(idx.y()) * grid_size,
203  static_cast<FloatingPoint>(idx.z()) * grid_size);
204 }
205 
211 inline GlobalIndex getGlobalVoxelIndexFromBlockAndVoxelIndex(
212  const BlockIndex& block_index, const VoxelIndex& voxel_index,
213  int voxels_per_side) {
214  return GlobalIndex(block_index.cast<LongIndexElement>() * voxels_per_side +
215  voxel_index.cast<LongIndexElement>());
216 }
217 
218 inline BlockIndex getBlockIndexFromGlobalVoxelIndex(
219  const GlobalIndex& global_voxel_idx, FloatingPoint voxels_per_side_inv) {
220  return BlockIndex(
221  std::floor(static_cast<FloatingPoint>(global_voxel_idx.x()) *
222  voxels_per_side_inv),
223  std::floor(static_cast<FloatingPoint>(global_voxel_idx.y()) *
224  voxels_per_side_inv),
225  std::floor(static_cast<FloatingPoint>(global_voxel_idx.z()) *
226  voxels_per_side_inv));
227 }
228 
229 inline bool isPowerOfTwo(int x) { return (x & (x - 1)) == 0; }
230 
236 inline VoxelIndex getLocalFromGlobalVoxelIndex(
237  const GlobalIndex& global_voxel_idx, const int voxels_per_side) {
238  // add a big number to the index to make it positive
239  constexpr int offset = 1 << (8 * sizeof(IndexElement) - 1);
240 
241  CHECK(isPowerOfTwo(voxels_per_side));
242 
243  return VoxelIndex((global_voxel_idx.x() + offset) & (voxels_per_side - 1),
244  (global_voxel_idx.y() + offset) & (voxels_per_side - 1),
245  (global_voxel_idx.z() + offset) & (voxels_per_side - 1));
246 }
247 
248 inline void getBlockAndVoxelIndexFromGlobalVoxelIndex(
249  const GlobalIndex& global_voxel_idx, const int voxels_per_side,
250  BlockIndex* block_index, VoxelIndex* voxel_index) {
251  CHECK_NOTNULL(block_index);
252  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel_index);
253  const FloatingPoint voxels_per_side_inv = 1.0 / voxels_per_side;
254  *block_index =
255  getBlockIndexFromGlobalVoxelIndex(global_voxel_idx, voxels_per_side_inv);
256  *voxel_index =
257  getLocalFromGlobalVoxelIndex(global_voxel_idx, voxels_per_side);
258 }
259 
260 // Math functions.
261 inline int signum(FloatingPoint x) { return (x == 0) ? 0 : x < 0 ? -1 : 1; }
262 
263 // For occupancy/octomap-style mapping.
264 inline float logOddsFromProbability(float probability) {
265  CHECK(probability >= 0.0f && probability <= 1.0f);
266  return log(probability / (1.0 - probability));
267 }
268 
269 inline float probabilityFromLogOdds(float log_odds) {
270  return 1.0 - (1.0 / (1.0 + exp(log_odds)));
271 }
272 
273 inline void transformPointcloud(const Transformation& T_N_O,
274  const Pointcloud& ptcloud,
275  Pointcloud* ptcloud_out) {
276  ptcloud_out->clear();
277  ptcloud_out->resize(ptcloud.size());
278 
279  for (size_t i = 0; i < ptcloud.size(); ++i) {
280  (*ptcloud_out)[i] = T_N_O * ptcloud[i];
281  }
282 }
